svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.12; rv:61.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/61.0" version="9.0.9" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="d3fc465a-dc1a-ea04-b0da-205c95ceacf8" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 171px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: Authorization page (or popup), implements authorization process inside client apps, allows Pryv user registration and password reset.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 98px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 110px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
User
[Person]
Willing to create a Pryv account

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

div.span: params: appid, username, pass, email, lang, hosting, invitationtoken=enjoy

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
3. go back to auth view,
optionally prefill user/pass

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 177px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: Dns and registration server, holds Pryv users and mapping to cores (hostings).
